title: 2003 Water Tank Trailer
item_description:
2003 Water Tank Trailer

2003 Texas Bragg Enterprises Trailer Details

  • Mfg: TXBRA
  • Year: 2003
  • VIN: 17XFJ082441040657
  • License: 4EN9825
    • Expiration Date: 2/28/2029
  • Gross Vehicle Weight Rating (GVWR): 7000lbs
  • Trailer Type: Landscaping

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 163”
  • Overall Width: 84”
  • Overall Height: 66”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Brake Type: Surge
  • Number of Wheels: 4
  • Tire Size: ST225/75R15
  • Electric Plug Type: 4-Way Flat
  • Hitch: Pintle Hitch

Note: Application for Replacement Title or Certificate of Title, and Transfer Form will be mailed 1-2 weeks following the last day of removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the inspections, transfer, registration, sales taxe, and fees due to DMV.
